mapper.select: SELECT SIGNON.USERNAME, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.FIRSTNAME, ACCOUNT.LASTNAME, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDR1 AS address1, ACCOUNT.ADDR2 AS address2, ACCOUNT.CITY, ACCOUNT.STATE, ACCOUNT.ZIP, ACCOUNT.COUNTRY, ACCOUNT.PHONE, FROM WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{userId}
SELECT USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, EMAIL, STATUS, ADDR1, ADDR2, CITY, STATE, ZIP, COUNTRY, PHONE, UNIVERSITY FROM ACCOUNT WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET USERID = #{userId}, PASSWORD = #{password}, USERNAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email}, STATUS = #{status}, ADDR1 = #{address1}, ADDR2 = #{address2}, CITY = #{city}, STATE = #{state}, ZIP = #{zipCode}, COUNTRY = #{country}, PHONE = #{phone}, UNIVERSITY = #{university} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, EMAIL, STATUS, ADDR1, ADDR2, CITY, STATE, ZIP, COUNTRY, PHONE, UNIVERSITY) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{status}, #{address1}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city}, #{state}, #{zipCode}, #{phone}, #{university})
